page.title: 04OTHER CHURCHES IN THE AREA
page.content:
THORPE-LE-SOKEN HAS A{BAPTIST CHURCH } BEHIND SOME HOUSES IN THE HIGH STREET. IT WAS BUILT IN 1802 AND HAS A SCHOOLROOM ATTACHED. INSIDE THE CHURCH THERE ARE PEWS AND THERE IS A BALCONY. SERVICES ARE HELD AT 11a.m. AND 6p.m. ON SUNDAYS AND THERE IS A SUNDAY SCHOOL AND A YOUNG PEOPLE'S GROUP. THE MINISTER IS THE REVEREND ERNEST NUNN.
THERE IS A SMALL{METHODIST CHURCH}IN LANDERMERE ROAD. IT WAS BUILT IN 1867 AND A NEW KITCHEN AND TOILET WAS MADE IN 1982. SERVICES ARE HELD AT 11a.m.ONSUNDAYS AND THERE IS A FAMILY SERVICE AT 3p.m. ON THE FOURTH SUNDAY OF EACH MONTH. THE CHURCH SHARES ITS MINISTER, THE REVEREND MICHAEL FEAST, WITH FOUR OTHER METHODIST CHURCHES IN FRINTON AND DISTRICT. ONCE A MONTH A UNITED SERVICE IS HELD AT EACH OF THE THREE CHURCHES IN TURN.
